message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV. 

This paper deals with a natural language processing task of sentence ordering, which falls under the category of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The proposed approach uses neural networks, which is a common technique in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of pointer networks is a specific type of neural network architecture, which is also used in other NLP tasks such as machine translation and summarization (cs.NE). Finally, the paper may also be relevant to computer vision (cs.CV) as it deals with the ordering of visual and textual information in a coherent manner.
